content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electricity network connecting multiple entities (id=9006)

### Iron Production Line
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Secondary Iron Production Line
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

### Research Lab Setup
- Lab with automation science pack research in progress
- Connected to the power network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Check if items exist in the source container before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest position and contents before extraction operations

### Power system fuel management
- Maintain adequate coal supply for boilers
- Check fuel levels before attempting to insert fuel
- Keep a reserve of coal in inventory for power system maintenance

### Production line resource management
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Monitor assembling machine input inventory to prevent resource shortages
- Keep production input chests stocked with required materials

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Verify entity positions and connections before operations
- Ensure proper alignment of inserters with source and target entities
- Check if belts are properly connected and oriented
